brief_summary.textblock:
A clinical study to determine the efficacy and safety of an investigational medication
      (MK0869) in the treatment of depression.

clinical_study.brief_title: Treatment of Patients With Major Depressive Disorder With MK0869

detailed_description.textblock: The duration of treatment is 10 weeks.

clinical_study.official_title: A Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Multicenter Study of the Long-Term Efficacy of MK0869 in the Maintenance of Antidepressant Effect in Geriatric Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: HAMD-17 score </= 10 after 10 weeks; maintenance of antidepressant effect for 6-10 months; tolerability

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

responsible_party.name_title: Executive Vice President, Clinical and Quantitative Sciences

secondary_outcome.measure: CGI-S score change from Week 10 at Month 6; HAMD-17 total score change from Week 10 at Month 6; MADRS total score change at Month 6,  HAMA total score change at Month 6

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Treatment
